com.wove

Class UserIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wove.UserIO

  • class UserIO
extends java.lang.Object
    class that handles all communication with the user

                                           Hand hand,
                                           java.util.List<Player> players,
                                           Dealer dealer,
                                           java.util.Set<PlayerAction> availableActions)
        Asks what the player would like to do next
        Parameters:
        player - current player being polled
        hand - current hand being polled
        players - all players
        dealer - the dealer
        availableActions - available actions to the user
        Returns:
        the chosen action

        Parameters:
        currentHand - the hand to be highlighted. null means nothing is highlighted
        players - the players of the game.
